# userInfo

**Instance Property**

The user info dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var userInfo: [String : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

If the user info dictionary has not been set, this property is `nil`.

On macOS 10.8 or later, if the user info dictionary has not been set, this property returns an empty dictionary.

## Related Documentation

- **localizedDescription**: A string containing the localized description of the error.

## Getting Error Properties

- **code**: The error code.
- **domain**: A string containing the error domain.
